title: NO and O2 - What decreases Keq for exothermic rxn

content.question:
2 NO(g) + O2(g) ⇄ 2 NO2(g)    ΔH < 0

Which of the following changes alone would cause a decrease in the value of Keq for the reaction represented above?

choices.label: Decreasing the volume of the reaction vessel
Increasing the volume of the reaction vessel

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
